Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've never heard of a Corrupted doing pranks before. Liv, can you check its original model?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Based on its shape and size, it is likely the painting model "Spray Can", also named Nozzle, from Cosmos Industries back in the middle Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It was mainly used to paint large areas, but some models were used in performances, education, and artistic creations...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Artistic creations?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So that\'s why it\'s been going around "creating"" and insisting that its work is ""art"...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But can mechs really undertake artistic endeavors?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even I'm not sure. In Babylonia, art made by mechs are under the strict supervision and guidance of humans.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If you leave them alone, then you'll get these strange drawings indecipherable to humans. Like these graffiti.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Mechs have always gone on well with humans in other areas, but when it comes to art...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, can you understand these drawings?', 4: '1'}
{1: '300', 2: 'I understand some bits, I think...', 3: '19', 4: "Nope, I'm lost like you guys.", 5: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, if you'd sounded a little bit more sincere, I just might have believed.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Thankfully, this means you're still normal...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv, now's not the time for this. Whether this paint can's been making art out of its own will or notâ€”", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It has destroyed a lot of Constructs, which means it's our enemy.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'As for its artistic mystery, I think the answer can only be found after we catch up with it.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But we've already lost track of it. Not to mention being in this magnetically disruptive mist.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not an issue. Our radars might not work, but we still have its trail... Look at the marks on the floor.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'These, are our tickets.', 4: '3'}
